replies.msg: 有車咪得

My friend Celine isn't very well-to-do whereas her boyfriend's family is very well-off. Last Sunday, Celine threw a party at her place where cheap wines were served. The sofas in her apartment are made of some cheap material. Her television is cheap and nasty. As many of us wanted to watch the news, I said "If I could turn on the television please." She then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel." Recently, she got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop that's about to go into liquidation. She bought a cheap pair of sneakers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought a good quality pair for her. She's too mean to buy new shoes. She's very cheap with the air conditioner too - it's only on for two hours each day then she turns the fans on and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. She vacationed in Macau last Tuesday but she's so cheap she didn't even buy us postcards. She stayed in a three-star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. She's a cornetist. She explained to us regarding a piece by Clementi "This passage should be played lyrically rather than rhythmically, otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw lots of her pencil marks on the score, such as Cantabile, silence, no pause here, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time.... Regarding teaching, she said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay for four lessons at a time or monthly. For this month, it's OK to pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards, pay for four lessons at a time. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers for live performances." She asked me to get her some Ravel scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a boxing match in which Paul hit Stephen with a cheap shot after he lost to Stephen. We also watched a comedy show which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes are cheap and vulgar. It's been reported that some iPhone models, particularly iPhone Seven emit radiation over the legal limit so I suggest you use Samsung Note Ten Plus instead since it emits the least radiation out of all phones to date. Samsung Galaxy S Nine Plus also has amazingly low radiation. Shirley got off at the wrong stop and had to wait for another bus. I said "How on earth did you miss your stop?" She then said "I'm sorry. What can I say?" She's a trumpeter. I complimented her on her trumpet skills. She said "Yes, what can I say?" The current situation is very bad. I said "Well, yes, what can I say?" This afternoon, I was shocked when I saw a car crash in the street. She said "I can imagine." Her brother too said "I'm sure you were." Anyway, I think it's time to get my beauty sleep. My girlfriend has tumbled into her warm duvet and got her beauty sleep. Night, sleep well!
